document.discussion_title: Kansas City Grain Prices Spot FOB Rail
document.topic_text: SJ_GR110 St. Joseph, MO Thu, Aug 11, 2016 USDA-MO Dept of Ag Market News Kansas City Daily Wheat Bids, FOB Track, dollars per bushel Futures 4.1225 Change (�/bu) Basis Change HRW Wheat: Ord Protein 3.7725-4.4725 UP 0.5 -35U to 35U UNCH 12 Pct Prot. 4.5325-5.0625 UP 3.5-UP 0.5 41U to 94U UP 3-UNCH 13 Pct Prot. 5.3225-5.4225 UP 10.5 120U to 130U UP 10 14 Pct Prot. 5.3225-5.4225 UP 10.5 120U to 130U UP 10 SRW Wheat NQ NQ NQ NQ White Corn 3.4600-3.4900 UNCH-DN 2 Cash bids reflect the difference between the basis and the futures settlement. HRW Wheat = US 1; SRW Wheat = US 2; White Corn = US 2 Kansas City Board of Trade symbols: F January, G February, H March, J April, K May, M June, N July, Q August, U September, V October, X November, Z December
